trans-unit.source: Adds a handler for an invokeable IPC. This handler will be called whenever a renderer calls ipcRenderer.invoke(channel, ...args).
trans-unit.target: 为可 invoke IPC添加处理程序。每当渲染器调用 ipcRenderer.invoke(channel, ...args) 时，都会调用此处理程序。

trans-unit.source: Adds a one time listener function for the event. This listener is invoked only the next time a message is sent to channel, after which it is removed.
trans-unit.target: 为事件添加一次 listener 功能。仅在下一次将消息发送到 channel 时才调用此 listener 器，然后将其删除。

trans-unit.source: Adds a vibrancy effect to the browser window. Passing null or an empty string will remove the vibrancy effect on the window.
trans-unit.target: 在浏览器窗口中添加生动效果。传递 null 或空字符串将消除窗口上的鲜艳效果。

trans-unit.source: Adds a window as a tab on this window, after the tab for the window instance.
trans-unit.target: 在该窗口实例的标签后,添加一个窗口作为该窗口的标签。

trans-unit.source: Adds an extra HTTP header. The header name will be issued as-is without lowercasing. It can be called only before first write. Calling this method after the first write will throw an error. If the passed value is not a String, its toString() method will be called to obtain the final value.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个额外的HTTP标头。标头名称将原封不动地发布。只能在首次写入之前调用它。第一次写入后调用此方法将引发错误。如果传递的值不是 String ，则将调用其 toString() 方法以获得最终值。

trans-unit.source: Adds an extra HTTP header. The header name will issued as it is without lowercasing. It can be called only before first write. Calling this method after the first write will throw an error. If the passed value is not a String, its toString() method will be called to obtain the final value.
trans-unit.target: 添加一个额外的HTTP标头。标头名称将按原样发布，不会小写。只能在首次写入之前调用它。第一次写入后调用此方法将引发错误。如果传递的值不是 String ，则将调用其 toString() 方法以获得最终值。

trans-unit.source: Adds scripts that will be executed on ALL web contents that are associated with this session just before normal preload scripts run.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified path to DevTools workspace. Must be used after DevTools creation:
trans-unit.target: 将指定的路径添加到DevTools工作区。必须在创建DevTools后使用。

trans-unit.source: Admitting feature-flagged changes, that do not otherwise alter existing code paths, at most points in the beta cycle is okay. Users can explicitly enable those flags in their apps.
trans-unit.target: 在测试周期的大部分时间里,如果不改变现有的代码路径,接纳功能标志的更改是可以的。用户可以在其应用程序中明确启用这些标志。

trans-unit.source: Admitting features of any sort after Week 3 in the beta cycle is 👎 without a very good reason.
trans-unit.target: 在测试周期的第三周后,如果没有很好的理由,承认任何形式的功能是👎。

trans-unit.source: Admitting non-breaking-API changes before Week 3 in the beta cycle is okay, even if those changes have the potential to cause moderate side-effects
trans-unit.target: 在β周期的第3周之前承认非突破性的API变化是可以的,即使这些变化有可能导致中度的副作用。

trans-unit.target: 在将你的应用程序捆绑到Electron中后,你会希望在向用户分发Electron之前重新塑造Electron的品牌。

trans-unit.target: 在完成准备工作之后，您可以按照Application Distribution打包您的应用程序，然后继续对您的应用程序进行签名。

trans-unit.target: 获取插件文件后，应使用 --widevine-cdm-path 命令行开关将 widevinecdmadapter 的路径传递给Electron ，并使用 --widevine-cdm-version 开关将插件的版本传递给Electron 。

trans-unit.target: 启动Electron应用程序后,您应该看到通知。

trans-unit.source: After re-uploading all distributions, publish again to upload the checksum file:
trans-unit.target: 重新上传所有发行版后,再次发布上传校验文件。

trans-unit.source: After running the command, you will notice that a folder named app.asar.unpacked was created together with the app.asar file. It contains the unpacked files and should be shipped together with the app.asar archive.
trans-unit.target: 运行该命令后，您会注意到与 app.asar 文件一起创建了一个名为 app.asar.unpacked 的文件夹。它包含解压缩的文件，应与 app.asar 存档一起发送。

trans-unit.source: After signing your app, you can use Application Loader to upload it to iTunes Connect for processing, making sure you have created a record before uploading.
trans-unit.target: 对您的应用程序签名后，可以使用Application Loader将其上传到iTunes Connect进行处理，确保在上传之前已创建了一条记录。

trans-unit.source: After these steps, you can submit your app for review.
trans-unit.target: 完成这些步骤后，您可以提交您的应用进行审核。

trans-unit.source: After this, you can grant additional permissions for specific hosts. For example, if you are opening a BrowserWindow pointed at https://example.com/, you can give that website exactly the abilities it needs, but no more.
trans-unit.target: 之后，您可以为特定主机授予其他权限。例如，如果您打开指向 https://example.com/ 的BrowserWindow ，则可以为该网站提供所需的功能，但仅此而已。

trans-unit.source: After this, you can grant additional permissions for specific hosts. For example, if you are opening a BrowserWindow pointed at `https://my-website.com/", you can give that website exactly the abilities it needs, but no more.
trans-unit.target: 之后，您可以为特定主机授予其他权限。例如，如果要打开指向` https://my-website.com/的BrowserWindow ，则可以为该网站提供所需的功能，但仅此而已。

trans-unit.source: After you upgrade Electron, you usually need to rebuild the modules.
trans-unit.target: 升级Electron后,通常需要重建模块。

trans-unit.source: Again, this list merely minimizes the risk, it does not remove it. If your goal is to display a website, a browser will be a more secure option.
trans-unit.target: 同样,这个列表只是将风险降到最低,并没有消除风险。如果你的目标是显示一个网站,浏览器将是一个更安全的选择。

trans-unit.source: Albanian
trans-unit.target: Albanian

trans-unit.source: All Electron APIs are assigned a process type. Many of them can only be used from the main process, some of them only from a renderer process, some from both. The documentation for each individual API will state which process it can be used from.
trans-unit.target: 所有的Electron API都有一个进程类型。其中许多API只能从主进程中使用,有些只能从渲染器进程中使用,有些则两者都可以使用。每个API的文档都会说明它可以从哪个进程中使用。

trans-unit.source: All built-in modules of Node.js are supported in Web Workers, and asar archives can still be read with Node.js APIs. However none of Electron's built-in modules can be used in a multi-threaded environment.
trans-unit.target: Web Workers支持所有Node.js的内置模块，并且仍可以使用Node.js API读取 asar 档案。但是，Electron的内置模块都不能在多线程环境中使用。

trans-unit.source: All header names are lowercased.
trans-unit.target: 所有的头名都是小写的。

trans-unit.source: All level one properties of the extra object in the crashReporteroptions object.
trans-unit.target: crashReporter options 对象中 extra 对象的所有第一级属性。

trans-unit.source: All mouse events happened in this window will be passed to the window below this window, but if this window has focus, it will still receive keyboard events.
trans-unit.target: 所有发生在这个窗口中的鼠标事件都会被传递到这个窗口下面的窗口,但如果这个窗口有焦点,它仍然会接收键盘事件。

trans-unit.source: All new major and minor releases lines begin with a -beta.N tag for N >= 1. At that point, the feature set is locked. That release line admits no further features, and focuses only on security and stability. e.g. 2.0.0-beta.1.
trans-unit.target: 所有新的主要和次要发行版行 -beta.N 标签开头，表示 N >= 1 。此时，功能部件集已锁定。该发行版不允许进一步的功能，仅关注安全性和稳定性。例如 2.0.0-beta.1 。

trans-unit.source: All new major and minor releases lines begin with a beta series indicated by semver prerelease tags of beta.N, e.g. 2.0.0-beta.1. After the first beta, subsequent beta releases must meet all of the following conditions:
trans-unit.target: 所有新的主要发行版和次要发行版行均以beta系列开头，该系列由beta.N的semver预发行标签 beta.N ，例如 2.0.0-beta.1 。在第一个Beta之后，后续的Beta版本必须满足以下所有条件：

trans-unit.source: All of Node.js's built-in modules are available in Electron and third-party node modules also fully supported as well (including the native modules).
trans-unit.target: 所有的Node.js内置模块都可以在Electron中使用，第三方节点模块（也包括本地模块）也得到完全支持。

trans-unit.source: All of Chromium's prebuilt binaries (libchromiumcontent) are downloaded when running the bootstrap script. By default both static libraries and shared libraries will be downloaded and the final size should be between 800MB and 2GB depending on the platform.
trans-unit.target: 运行引导脚本时，会下载Chromium的所有预构建二进制文件（ libchromiumcontent ）。默认情况下，静态库和共享库都将被下载，最终大小应在800MB到2GB之间，具体取决于平台。

trans-unit.source: All pull requests require approval from a Code Owner of the area you modified in order to land. Whenever a maintainer reviews a pull request they may request changes. These may be small, such as fixing a typo, or may involve substantive changes. Such requests are intended to be helpful, but at times may come across as abrupt or unhelpful, especially if they do not include concrete suggestions on how to change them.
trans-unit.target: 所有拉动请求都需要得到您修改区域的代码所有者的批准才能着陆。维护者每当审核一个拉取请求时，都可以请求更改。这些可能很小，例如修正了错字，或者可能涉及实质性的更改。此类请求旨在帮助您，但有时可能会突然或无益，尤其是如果它们未包含有关如何更改请求的具体建议时。

trans-unit.source: All pull requests require approval from a Code Owner of the area you modified in order to land. Whenever a maintainer reviews a pull request they may request changes. These may be small, such as fixing a typo, or may involve substantive changes. Such requests are intended to be helpful, but at times may come across as abrupt or unhelpful, especially if they do not include concrete suggestions on how to change them.
trans-unit.target: 所有的上拉请求需要从审批代码所有者你修饰以土地面积。维护者每当审核一个拉取请求时，都可以请求更改。这些可能很小，例如修正了错字，或者可能涉及实质性的更改。此类请求旨在提供帮助，但有时可能会突然或无益，特别是如果它们未包含有关如何更改请求的具体建议。

trans-unit.source: All reactions between the embedder frame and webview are asynchronous.
trans-unit.target: 嵌入器框架和 webview 之间的所有反应都是异步的。

trans-unit.source: All supported release lines will accept external pull requests to backport fixes previously merged to master, though this may be on a case-by-case basis for some older supported lines. All contested decisions around release line backports will be resolved by the Releases Working Group as an agenda item at their weekly meeting the week the backport PR is raised.
trans-unit.target: 所有受支持的发行版都将接受外部拉取请求，以向后移植先前合并到 master 的修补程序，尽管某些旧的受支持的发行版可能会逐案处理。在发布反向PR提出的那一周，发布工作组将在其每周会议上解决所有与发布线反向移植有关的有争议的决定，作为其议程项目。

trans-unit.source: All three cases are covered by the same API - the setProgressBar() method available on an instance of BrowserWindow. To indicate your progress, call this method with a number between 0 and 1. For example, if you have a long-running task that is currently at 63% towards completion, you would call it as setProgressBar(0.63).
trans-unit.target: 所有这三种情况都由相同的API覆盖 BrowserWindow 实例上可用的 setProgressBar() 方法。要指示您的进度，请使用 0 到 1 之间的数字调用此方法。例如，如果您有一个长期运行的任务，当前正在完成的任务为63％，则可以将其称为 setProgressBar(0.63) 。

trans-unit.source: All three cases are covered by the same API - the setProgressBar() method available on instances of BrowserWindows. Call it with a number between 0 and 1 to indicate your progress. If you have a long-running task that's currently at 63% towards completion, you'd call it with setProgressBar(0.63).
trans-unit.target: 这三种情况都由相同的API覆盖 BrowserWindows 实例上可用的 setProgressBar() 方法。用介于 0 和 1 之间的数字来调用它以指示您的进度。如果您有一个长期运行的任务，目前正在完成的任务为63％，则可以使用 setProgressBar(0.63) 来调用它。

trans-unit.source: All three operating systems provide means for applications to send notifications to the user. Electron conveniently allows developers to send notifications with the HTML5 Notification API, using the currently running operating system's native notification APIs to display it.
trans-unit.target: 这三个操作系统都为应用程序提供了向用户发送通知的方法。Electron方便地允许开发人员使用HTML5 Notification API发送通知，并使用当前运行的操作系统的本机通知API进行显示。

trans-unit.source: All three operating systems provide means for applications to send notifications to the user. The technique of showing notifications is different for the Main and Renderer processes.
trans-unit.target: 三种操作系统都为应用程序提供了向用户发送通知的手段。主进程和Renderer进程显示通知的技术是不同的。

trans-unit.source: All windows will be closed immediately without asking the user, and the before-quit and will-quit events will not be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 所有窗口将立即关闭，而无需询问用户，并且不会发出 will-quit before-quit 和退出事件。

trans-unit.source: All windows will be closed immediately without asking user and the before-quit and will-quit events will not be emitted.
trans-unit.target: 所有窗口将立即关闭，而无需询问用户，并且不会发出 will-quit before-quit 和退出事件。

trans-unit.source: Allows resuming cancelled or interrupted downloads from previous Session. The API will generate a DownloadItem that can be accessed with the will-download event. The DownloadItem will not have any WebContents associated with it and the initial state will be interrupted. The download will start only when the resume API is called on the DownloadItem.
trans-unit.target: 允许从上一 Session 恢复 cancelled 或 interrupted 下载。API将生成一个DownloadItem，可以通过will-download事件对其进行访问。该DownloadItem不会有任何 WebContents 与它的初始状态将相关 interrupted 。仅当在DownloadItem上调用 resume API 时，下载才会开始。

trans-unit.source: Also note that native modules may have intermediate files produced which should not be included (as they would also need to be signed). If you use electron-packager before version 8.1.0, add --ignore=.+\.o$ to your build step to ignore these files. Versions 8.1.0 and later ignores those files by default.
trans-unit.target: 还请注意，本机模块可能会产生不应包含的中间文件（因为它们也需要签名）。如果您在8.1.0之前的版本中使用electronic-packager，请在构建步骤中添加 --ignore=.+\.o$ 以忽略这些文件。默认情况下，版本8.1.0和更高版本会忽略这些文件。

trans-unit.source: Also note that native modules may have intermediate files produced which should not be included (as they would also need to be signed). If you use electron-packager before version 8.1.0, add --ignore=.+\.o$ to your build step to ignore these files. Versions 8.1.0 and later ignore those files by default.
trans-unit.target: 还要注意，本机模块可能产生了不应包含的中间文件（因为它们也需要签名）。如果您在版本8.1.0之前使用electronic-packager，请在构建步骤中添加 --ignore=.+\.o$ 以忽略这些文件。默认情况下，版本8.1.0和更高版本会忽略这些文件。

trans-unit.source: Also on Windows and Linux, you can use a & in the top-level item name to indicate which letter should get a generated accelerator. For example, using &File for the file menu would result in a generated Alt-F accelerator that opens the associated menu. The indicated character in the button label gets an underline. The & character is not displayed on the button label.
trans-unit.target: 同样在Windows和Linux上，您可以在顶级项目名称中使用 & 来指示应该获得生成加速器的字母。例如，对文件菜单使用 &File 会生成一个用于打开关联菜单的生成的 Alt-F 加速器。按钮标签中的指示字符带有下划线。在 & 字符不显示按钮标签上。

trans-unit.source: Also, due to the usage of app sandboxing, the resources which can be accessed by the app are strictly limited; you can read App Sandboxing for more information.
trans-unit.target: 另外，由于使用了应用程序沙箱，因此可以限制应用程序可以访问的资源；您可以阅读App Sandboxing了解更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Also, on Windows, you'll need to set the environment variable DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN=0. To do so, open Control Panel → System and Security → System → Advanced system settings and add a system variable DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN with value 0. This tells depot_tools to use your locally installed version of Visual Studio (by default, depot_tools will try to download a Google-internal version that only Googlers have access to).
trans-unit.target: 另外，在Windows上，您需要设置环境变量 DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN=0 。为此，请打开 Control Panel → System and Security → System → Advanced system settings 并添加值为 0 的系统变量 DEPOT_TOOLS_WIN_TOOLCHAIN 。这告诉 depot_tools 使用本地安装的Visual Studio版本（默认情况下， depot_tools 会尝试下载仅Google员工有权访问的Google内部版本）。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, pass an argument to run with your electron binary that points to your app's folder. This eliminates the need to copy-paste your app into Electron's resource directory.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, the command line argument --enable-logging can be passed. More information is available in the command line switches documentation.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can override the local cache. @electron/get will cache downloaded binaries in a local directory to not stress your network. You can use that cache folder to provide custom builds of Electron or to avoid making contact with the network at all.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以覆盖本地缓存。 @electron/get 会将下载的二进制文件缓存在本地目录中，以免给您的网络造成压力。您可以使用该缓存文件夹提供自定义版本的Electron或完全避免与网络联系。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can override the local cache. electron-download will cache downloaded binaries in a local directory to not stress your network. You can use that cache folder to provide custom builds of Electron or to avoid making contact with the network at all.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以覆盖本地缓存。 electron-download 将下载的二进制文件缓存在本地目录中，以免给您的网络造成压力。您可以使用该缓存文件夹提供自定义版本的Electron或完全避免与网络联系。

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the IPC primitives that are provided by Electron. To share data between the main and renderer processes, you can use the ipcMain and ipcRenderer modules. To communicate directly between web pages, you can send a MessagePort from one to the other, possibly via the main process using ipcRenderer.postMessage(). Subsequent communication over message ports is direct and does not detour through the main process.
trans-unit.target: 或者，您可以使用Electron提供的IPC原语。要在主进程和渲染器进程之间共享数据，可以使用 ipcMain 和 ipcRenderer 模块。要直接在网页之间进行通信，可以使用 ipcRenderer.postMessage() 通过主进程将 MessagePort 从一个发送到另一个。消息端口上的后续通信是直接的，不会绕过主要过程。

trans-unit.source: Another difference is that sandboxed renderers don't modify any of the default JavaScript APIs. Consequently, some APIs such as window.open will work as they do in Chromium (i.e. they do not return a BrowserWindowProxy).

trans-unit.source: Another difference is that sandboxed renderers don't modify any of the default JavaScript APIs. Consequently, some APIs such as window.open will work as they do in chromium (i.e. they do not return a BrowserWindowProxy).

trans-unit.source: Another factor is that the Node project patches its version of V8. As mentioned above, Electron builds everything with a single copy of V8, so Node's V8 patches must be ported to that copy.
trans-unit.target: 另一个因素是Node项目对其V8版本进行了修补。如上所述,Electron用V8的单一副本构建一切,所以Node的V8补丁必须移植到该副本上。

trans-unit.source: Another important limitation is that the compiled AppX package still contains a win32 executable - and will therefore not run on Xbox, HoloLens, or Phones.
trans-unit.target: 另一个重要的限制是,编译后的AppX包仍然包含一个win32可执行文件--因此无法在Xbox、HoloLens或Phones上运行。

trans-unit.source: Any native Node.js module can be loaded directly in Web Workers, but it is strongly recommended not to do so. Most existing native modules have been written assuming single-threaded environment, using them in Web Workers will lead to crashes and memory corruptions.
trans-unit.target: 任何原生Node.js模块都可以直接在Web Workers中加载,但强烈建议不要这样做。大多数现有的原生模块都是在单线程环境下编写的,在Web Workers中使用它们会导致崩溃和内存损坏。

trans-unit.source: Any pattern containing a forward or backward slash will be tested against the whole pathname and not just the module. E.g. */foo/bar/*=2 would change the logging level for all code in the source files under a foo/bar directory.
trans-unit.target: 任何包含正斜杠或反斜杠的模式都将针对整个路径名（而不仅仅是模块）进行测试。例如 */foo/bar/*=2 将更改 foo/bar 目录下源文件中所有代码的日志记录级别。

trans-unit.source: Any resources not included with your application should be loaded using a secure protocol like HTTPS. In other words, do not use insecure protocols like HTTP. Similarly, we recommend the use of WSS over WS, FTPS over FTP, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序未包含的所有资源都应使用安全协议（如 HTTPS )加载。换句话说，请勿使用 HTTP 之类的不安全协议。同样，我们建议在 WS 上使用 WSS ，在 FTP 上使用 FTPS ，等等。

trans-unit.source: Applications define tasks based on both the program's features and the key things a user is expected to do with them. Tasks should be context-free, in that the application does not need to be running for them to work. They should also be the statistically most common actions that a normal user would perform in an application, such as compose an email message or open the calendar in a mail program, create a new document in a word processor, launch an application in a certain mode, or launch one of its subcommands. An application should not clutter the menu with advanced features that standard users won't need or one-time actions such as registration. Do not use tasks for promotional items such as upgrades or special offers.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序根据程序的功能和用户需要做的关键事情来定义任务。任务应该是不需要上下文的,即应用程序不需要运行就可以工作。它们也应该是正常用户在应用程序中最常见的操作,比如在邮件程序中编写电子邮件信息或打开日历,在文字处理器中创建一个新的文档,在某种模式下启动一个应用程序,或者启动它的一个子命令。应用程序不应该用标准用户不需要的高级功能或注册等一次性操作使菜单杂乱无章。不要将任务用于升级或特别优惠等促销项目。

trans-unit.source: As web developers, we usually enjoy the strong security net of the browser - the risks associated with the code we write are relatively small. Our websites are granted limited powers in a sandbox, and we trust that our users enjoy a browser built by a large team of engineers that is able to quickly respond to newly discovered security threats.
trans-unit.target: 作为网络开发者,我们通常会享受浏览器这张强大的安全网--我们编写的代码所带来的风险相对较小。我们的网站在沙盒中被赋予了有限的权力,我们相信我们的用户享受到的是一个由庞大的工程师团队打造的浏览器,它能够快速应对新发现的安全威胁。

trans-unit.source: Being based on Chromium, Electron requires a display driver to function. If Chromium can't find a display driver, Electron will fail to launch - and therefore not executing any of your tests, regardless of how you are running them. Testing Electron-based apps on Travis, Circle, Jenkins or similar Systems requires therefore a little bit of configuration. In essence, we need to use a virtual display driver.
trans-unit.target: 作为基于Chromium的软件,Electron需要一个显示驱动才能运行。如果Chromium找不到显示驱动,Electron将无法启动--因此无论你如何运行,都无法执行任何测试。在Travis,Circle,Jenkins或类似的系统上测试基于Electron的应用程序需要进行一些配置。本质上,我们需要使用一个虚拟的显示驱动。

trans-unit.source: Both Chromium and Node.js are impressive feats of engineering built by thousands of talented developers. Given their popularity, their security is carefully tested and analyzed by equally skilled security researchers. Many of those researchers disclose vulnerabilities responsibly, which generally means that researchers will give Chromium and Node.js some time to fix issues before publishing them. Your application will be more secure if it is running a recent version of Electron (and thus, Chromium and Node.js) for which potential security issues are not as widely known.

trans-unit.source: By default Electron is built with prebuilt clang binaries provided by the Chromium project. If for some reason you want to build with the clang installed in your system, you can call bootstrap.py with --clang_dir=<path> switch. By passing it the build script will assume the clang binaries reside in <path>/bin/.

trans-unit.source: By default Electron manages the devtools by creating an internal WebContents with native view, which developers have very limited control of. trans-unit.source: By default Electron will download hunspell dictionaries from the Chromium CDN. trans-unit.source: By default, if an app of the same name as the one being moved exists in the Applications directory and is not running, the existing app will be trashed and the active app moved into its place. If it is running, the pre-existing running app will assume focus and the previously active app will quit itself. This behavior can be changed by providing the optional conflict handler, where the boolean returned by the handler determines whether or not the move conflict is resolved with default behavior. i.e. returning false will ensure no further action is taken, returning true will result in the default behavior and the method continuing.

This behavior can be changed by providing the optional conflict handler, where the boolean returned by the handler determines whether or not the move conflict is resolved with default behavior. i.e. returning false will ensure no further action is taken, returning true will result in the default behavior and the method continuing.

trans-unit.source: Child processes typically cache trace data and only rarely flush and send trace data back to the main process. This helps to minimize the runtime overhead of tracing since sending trace data over IPC can be an expensive operation. So, to end tracing, Chromium asynchronously asks all child processes to flush any pending trace data.
trans-unit.target: 子进程通常会缓存跟踪数据,只在很少的情况下刷新并向主进程发送跟踪数据。这有助于最大限度地减少跟踪的运行时开销,因为通过IPC发送跟踪数据是一个昂贵的操作。因此,为了结束跟踪,Chromium异步要求所有子进程刷新任何待处理的跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: Child processes typically cache trace data and only rarely flush and send trace data back to the main process. This helps to minimize the runtime overhead of tracing since sending trace data over IPC can be an expensive operation. So, to end tracing, we must asynchronously ask all child processes to flush any pending trace data.
trans-unit.target: 子进程通常会缓存跟踪数据,只在很少的情况下刷新并向主进程发送跟踪数据。这有助于最大限度地减少跟踪的运行时开销,因为通过IPC发送跟踪数据可能是一个昂贵的操作。因此,为了结束跟踪,我们必须异步地要求所有子进程刷新任何待处理的跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: Child processes typically cache trace data and only rarely flush and send trace data back to the main process. This is because it may be an expensive operation to send the trace data over IPC and we would like to avoid unneeded runtime overhead from tracing. So, to end tracing, we must asynchronously ask all child processes to flush any pending trace data.
trans-unit.target: 子进程通常会缓存跟踪数据,只有很少的情况下才会刷新并将跟踪数据发送回主进程。这是因为通过IPC发送跟踪数据可能是一个昂贵的操作,而且我们希望避免跟踪带来不必要的运行时开销。所以,为了结束跟踪,我们必须异步要求所有子进程刷新任何待处理的跟踪数据。

trans-unit.source: Consider a normal window with an HD video player and associated controls. Perhaps there are 15 pixels of controls on the left edge, 25 pixels of controls on the right edge and 50 pixels of controls below the player. In order to maintain a 16:9 aspect ratio (standard aspect ratio for HD @1920x1080) within the player itself we would call this function with arguments of 16/9 and [ 40, 50 ]. The second argument doesn't care where the extra width and height are within the content view--only that they exist. Just sum any extra width and height areas you have within the overall content view.
trans-unit.target: 考虑一个普通的窗口,里面有一个高清视频播放器和相关的控件。也许左边缘有15个像素的控件,右边缘有25个像素的控件,播放器下方有50个像素的控件。为了在播放器本身保持16:9的宽高比(高清的标准宽高比@1920x1080),我们将调用这个函数,参数为16/9和[40,50 ]。第二个参数并不关心额外的宽度和高度在内容视图中的位置,只关心它们是否存在。只需将你在内容视图中的任何额外的宽度和高度区域相加即可。

trans-unit.source: Consider a normal window with an HD video player and associated controls. Perhaps there are 15 pixels of controls on the left edge, 25 pixels of controls on the right edge and 50 pixels of controls below the player. In order to maintain a 16:9 aspect ratio (standard aspect ratio for HD @1920x1080) within the player itself we would call this function with arguments of 16/9 and { width: 40, height: 50 }. The second argument doesn't care where the extra width and height are within the content view--only that they exist. Sum any extra width and height areas you have within the overall content view.
trans-unit.target: 考虑一个普通的窗口,里面有一个高清视频播放器和相关的控件。也许左边缘有15个像素的控件,右边缘有25个像素的控件,播放器下方有50个像素的控件。为了在播放器本身保持16:9的宽高比(高清的标准宽高比@1920x1080),我们将调用这个函数,参数为16/9和{width:40,height:50 }。第二个参数并不关心额外的宽度和高度在内容视图中的位置,只关心它们是否存在。将你在整个内容视图中的任何额外的宽度和高度区域相加。

trans-unit.source: Context Isolation
trans-unit.target: 语境隔离

trans-unit.source: Context isolation allows each the scripts on running in the renderer to make changes to its JavaScript environment without worrying about conflicting with the scripts in the Electron API or the preload script.
trans-unit.target: Context isolation允许每个在渲染器中运行的脚本对其JavaScript环境进行修改,而不用担心与Electron API中的脚本或预加载脚本发生冲突。

trans-unit.source: Context isolation is an Electron feature that allows developers to run code in preload scripts and in Electron APIs in a dedicated JavaScript context. In practice, that means that global objects like Array.prototype.push or JSON.parse cannot be modified by scripts running in the renderer process.
trans-unit.target: 上下文隔离是Electron的一项功能，允许开发人员在专用JavaScript上下文中的预加载脚本和Electron API中运行代码。实际上，这意味着渲染器进程中运行的脚本无法修改 Array.prototype.push 或 JSON.parse 之类的全局对象。

trans-unit.source: Context isolation will always be enabled in the opened window if it is enabled on the parent window.
trans-unit.target: 如果在父窗口中启用了上下文隔离，则始终在打开的 window 中启用它。

trans-unit.source: Context menu

trans-unit.source: Contributors are encouraged to solve issues collaboratively and help one another make progress. If encounter an issue that you feel is invalid, or which contains incorrect information, explain why you feel that way with additional supporting context, and be willing to be convinced that you may be wrong. By doing so, we can often reach the correct outcome faster.
trans-unit.target: 鼓励贡献者共同解决问题并互相帮助。如果遇到您认为无效或包含不正确信息的问题，请在附加支持上下文中说明为什么会这样，并愿意说服您错了。这样，我们通常可以更快地达到正确的结果。

trans-unit.source: Crash reports are saved locally in an application-specific temp directory folder. For a productName of YourName, crash reports will be stored in a folder named YourName Crashes inside the temp directory. You can customize this temp directory location for your app by calling the app.setPath('temp', '/my/custom/temp') API before starting the crash reporter.
trans-unit.target: 崩溃报告保存在本地的特定于应用程序的临时目录文件夹中。对于一个 productName 的 YourName ，崩溃报告将被存储在一个文件夹名为 YourName Crashes 的临时目录中。您可以通过在启动崩溃报告器之前调用 app.setPath('temp', '/my/custom/temp') API 为您的应用程序定制此临时目录位置。

trans-unit.source: Crash reports are stored temporarily before being uploaded in a directory underneath the app's user data directory (called 'Crashpad' on Windows and Mac, or 'Crash Reports' on Linux). You can override this directory by calling app.setPath('crashDumps', '/path/to/crashes') before starting the crash reporter.
trans-unit.target: Crash reports are stored temporarily before being uploaded in a directory underneath the app's user data directory (called 'Crashpad' on Windows and Mac, or 'Crash Reports' on Linux). You can override this directory by calling app.setPath('crashDumps', '/path/to/crashes') before starting the crash reporter.

trans-unit.source: Debug symbols allow you to have better debugging sessions. They have information about the functions contained in executables and dynamic libraries and provide you with information to get clean call stacks. A Symbol Server allows the debugger to load the correct symbols, binaries and sources automatically without forcing users to download large debugging files. The server functions like Microsoft's symbol server so the documentation there can be useful.
trans-unit.target: 调试符号使您可以拥有更好的调试会话。它们具有有关可执行文件和动态库中包含的功能的信息，并为您提供获取干净调用堆栈的信息。Symbol Server允许调试器自动加载正确的符号，二进制文件和源代码，而不必强迫用户下载大型调试文件。该服务器的功能类似于Microsoft的符号服务器，因此该文档非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Debugging the main process is a bit trickier, since you cannot open developer tools for them. The Chromium Developer Tools can be used to debug Electron's main process thanks to a closer collaboration between Google / Chrome and Node.js, but you might encounter oddities like require not being present in the console.

trans-unit.source: Developers want to know which releases are safe to use. Even seemingly innocent features can introduce regressions in complex applications. Our goal is to allow the following standard semver ranges in package.json :

trans-unit.source: Due to the Node.js integration of Electron, there are some extra symbols inserted into the DOM like module, exports, require. This causes problems for some libraries since they want to insert the symbols with the same names.
trans-unit.target: 由于Electron的Node.js集成，因此在DOM中插入了一些额外的符号，例如 module ， exports ， require 。由于某些库要插入具有相同名称的符号，因此这会引起问题。

trans-unit.source: Due to the system access privileges of the main process, functionality provided by the main process modules may be dangerous in the hands of malicious code running in a compromised renderer process. By limiting the set of accessible modules to the minimum that your app needs and filtering out the others, you reduce the toolset that malicious code can use to attack the system.
trans-unit.target: 由于主进程的系统访问权限,主进程模块所提供的功能在运行在受损的渲染器进程中的恶意代码手中可能是危险的。通过将可访问模块集限制在您的应用程序所需的最低限度,并过滤掉其他模块,您可以减少恶意代码可以用来攻击系统的工具集。

trans-unit.source: Duplicates of age, authorization, content-length, content-type, etag, expires, from, host, if-modified-since, if-unmodified-since, last-modified, location, max-forwards, proxy-authorization, referer, retry-after, server, or user-agent are discarded.
trans-unit.target: Duplicates of age , authorization , content-length , content-type , etag , expires , from , host , if-modified-since , if-unmodified-since , last-modified , location , max-forwards , proxy-authorization , referer , retry-after , server , or user-agent are discarded.

trans-unit.source: Each object (including functions) returned by the remote module represents an object in the main process (we call it a remote object or remote function). When you invoke methods of a remote object, call a remote function, or create a new object with the remote constructor (function), you are actually sending synchronous inter-process messages.
trans-unit.target: remote 模块返回的每个对象（包括函数）在主进程中都代表一个对象（我们称其为远程对象或远程函数）。当您调用远程对象的方法，调用远程函数或使用远程构造函数（函数）创建新对象时，实际上是在发送同步的进程间消息。

trans-unit.source: Electron APIs are assigned based on the process type, meaning that some modules can be used from either the Main or Renderer process, and some from both. Electron's API documentation indicates which process each module can be used from.

trans-unit.source: Electron APIs uses the same capitalization scheme as Node.js:
trans-unit.target: Electron APIs使用与Node.js相同的大写方案。

trans-unit.source: Electron also provides some extra built-in modules for developing native desktop applications. Some modules are only available in the main process, some are only available in the renderer process (web page), and some can be used in both processes.
trans-unit.target: Electron还提供了一些额外的内置模块用于开发本地桌面应用程序。有些模块只在主进程中可用,有些模块只在渲染器进程(网页)中可用,有些模块可以在两个进程中使用。

trans-unit.source: Electron application will enable accessibility automatically when it detects assistive technology (Windows) or VoiceOver (macOS). See Chrome's accessibility documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 电子应用程序在检测到辅助技术（Windows）或VoiceOver（macOS）时将自动启用辅助功能。有关更多详细信息，请参见Chrome的辅助功能文档。

trans-unit.source: Electron applications keep accessibility disabled by default for performance reasons but there are multiple ways to enable it.
trans-unit.target: 由于性能原因,Electron应用程序默认禁用可访问性,但有多种方法可以启用它。

trans-unit.source: Electron applications will automatically enable accessibility features in the presence of assistive technology (e.g. JAWS on Windows or VoiceOver on macOS). See Chrome's accessibility documentation for more details.
trans-unit.target: 电子应用程序将在存在辅助技术（例如Windows上的JAWS或macOS上的VoiceOver）的情况下自动启用辅助功能。有关更多详细信息，请参见Chrome的辅助功能文档。

trans-unit.source: Electron apps are developed in JavaScript using the same principles and methods found in Node.js development. All APIs and features found in Electron are accessible through the electron module, which can be required like any other Node.js module:
trans-unit.target: 电子应用程序使用与Node.js开发中相同的原理和方法在JavaScript中开发。可通过 electron 模块访问Electron中找到的所有API和功能，就像其他任何Node.js模块一样，这可能是必需的：

trans-unit.source: Electron attempts to automate the work around the Application User Model ID. When Electron is used together with the installation and update framework Squirrel, shortcuts will automatically be set correctly. Furthermore, Electron will detect that Squirrel was used and will automatically call app.setAppUserModelId() with the correct value. During development, you may have to call app.setAppUserModelId() yourself.
trans-unit.target: Electron尝试自动执行围绕“应用程序用户模型ID”的工作。当Electron与安装和更新框架Squirrel一起使用时，快捷方式将自动正确设置。此外，Electron将检测到已使用Squirrel，并会自动以正确的值调用 app.setAppUserModelId() 。在开发过程中，您可能必须自己调用 app.setAppUserModelId() 。

trans-unit.source: Electron attempts to automate the work around the Application User Model ID. When Electron is used together with the installation and update framework Squirrel, shortcuts will automatically be set correctly. Furthermore, Electron will detect that Squirrel was used and will automatically call app.setAppUserModelId() with the correct value. During development, you may have to call app.setAppUserModelId()(../api/app.md#appsetappusermodelidid-windows)] yourself.
trans-unit.target: Electron尝试自动执行围绕“应用程序用户模型ID”的工作。当Electron与安装和更新框架Squirrel一起使用时，快捷方式将自动正确设置。此外，Electron将检测到已使用Squirrel，并将自动使用正确的值调用 app.setAppUserModelId() 。在开发过程中，您可能必须自己调用 app.setAppUserModelId() （../api/app.md#appsetappusermodelidid-windows）]。

trans-unit.source: Electron began in 2013 as the framework on which Atom, GitHub's hackable text editor, would be built. The two were open sourced in the Spring of 2014.
trans-unit.target: Electron始于2013年，最初是构建GitHub可入侵文本编辑器Atom的框架。两者于2014年春季开源。

trans-unit.target: Electron构建V8作为Chromium的一部分,然后在构建时将Node指向该V8。
