trans-unit.target: 电子由三大支柱组成。

trans-unit.source: Electron debug builds will use this shared library to link against.
trans-unit.target: Electron调试构建将使用这个共享库来链接。

trans-unit.source: Electron development is essentially Node.js development. To turn your operating system into an environment capable of building desktop apps with Electron, you will merely need Node.js, npm, a code editor of your choice, and a rudimentary understanding of your operating system's command line client.
trans-unit.target: Electron开发本质上就是Node.js开发。要把你的操作系统变成一个能够用Electron开发桌面应用的环境,你只需要Node.js、npm、一个你选择的代码编辑器,以及对操作系统的命令行客户端的基本了解。

trans-unit.source: Electron development is un-opinionated - there is no "one true way" to develop, build, package, or release an Electron application. Additional features for Electron, both for build- and run-time, can usually be found on npm in individual packages, allowing developers to build both the app and build pipeline they need.
trans-unit.target: 电子开发不受限制-没有开发，构建，打包或发布Electron应用程序的“真正方法”。通常在npm的单独软件包中可以找到Electron的附加功能，包括构建时和运行时的附加功能，使开发人员可以构建应用程序并构建所需的管道。

trans-unit.source: Electron development is unopinionated - there is no "one true way" to develop, build, package, or release an Electron application. Additional features for Electron, both for build- and run-time, can usually be found on npm in individual packages, allowing developers to build both the app and build pipeline they need.
trans-unit.target: 电子开发不受限制-没有开发，构建，打包或发布电子应用程序的“真正方法”。通常在npm的单独软件包中可以找到有关Electron的附加功能（用于构建和运行时），从而使开发人员可以构建应用程序和构建所需的管道。

trans-unit.source: Electron doesn't ship with the Widevine CDM plugin for license reasons, to get it, you need to install the official Chrome browser first, which should match the architecture and Chrome version of the Electron build you use.
trans-unit.target: 由于授权原因,Electron并没有搭载Widevine CDM插件,要想获得它,你需要先安装官方的Chrome浏览器,它应该与你使用的Electron构建的架构和Chrome版本相匹配。

trans-unit.source: Electron enables developers to disable various security features that control a renderer process. In most cases, developers do not need to disable any of those features - and you should therefore not allow different configurations for newly created <WebView> tags.
trans-unit.target: Electron使开发人员可以禁用控制渲染器过程的各种安全功能。在大多数情况下，开发人员无需禁用任何这些功能-因此，您不应为新创建的 <WebView> 标记允许不同的配置。

trans-unit.source: Electron enables developers to disable various security features that control a renderer process. In most cases, developers do not need to disable any of those features - and you should therefore not allow different configurations for newly created <webview> tags.
trans-unit.target: Electron使开发人员能够禁用控制渲染器过程的各种安全功能。在大多数情况下，开发人员无需禁用任何这些功能-因此，您不应为新创建的 <webview> 标记允许不同的配置。

trans-unit.source: Electron enables you to create desktop applications with pure JavaScript by providing a runtime with rich native (operating system) APIs. You could see it as a variant of the Node.js runtime that is focused on desktop applications instead of web servers.
trans-unit.target: Electron通过提供一个具有丰富的本地(操作系统)API的运行时,使你能够用纯JavaScript创建桌面应用程序。你可以把它看作是Node.js运行时的一个变种,它专注于桌面应用而不是Web服务器。

trans-unit.source: Electron exposes full access to Node.js API and its modules both in the Main and the Renderer processes. For example, you can read all the files from the root directory:
trans-unit.target: Electron在Main和Renderer进程中公开了对Node.js API及其模块的完全访问。例如,你可以读取根目录下的所有文件。

trans-unit.source: Electron exposes full access to Node.js both in the main and the renderer process. This has two important implications:
trans-unit.target: Electron在主进程和渲染器进程中都暴露了对Node.js的完全访问。这有两个重要意义。

trans-unit.source: Electron has APIs to configure the app's icon in the Windows taskbar. Supported are the creation of a JumpList, custom thumbnails and toolbars, icon overlays, and the so-called "Flash Frame" effect, but Electron also uses the app's dock icon to implement cross-platform features like recent documents and application progress.
trans-unit.target: Electron具有用于在Windows任务栏中配置应用程序图标的API。支持创建 JumpList ，自定义缩略图和工具栏，图标覆盖以及所谓的“ Flash Frame”效果，但是Electron还使用应用程序的停靠图标来实现跨平台功能，例如最近的文档和应用程序进度。

trans-unit.source: Electron has APIs to configure the app's icon in the Windows taskbar. This API supports both Windows-only features like creation of a JumpList, custom thumbnails and toolbars, icon overlays, and the so-called "Flash Frame" effect, and cross-platform features like recent documents and application progress.
trans-unit.target: Electron具有用于在Windows任务栏中配置应用程序图标的API。该API支持仅Windows的功能，例如创建 JumpList ，自定义缩略图和工具栏，图标覆盖和所谓的“ Flash Frame”效果，以及跨平台功能，例如最近的文档和应用程序进度。

trans-unit.source: Electron has APIs to configure the app's icon in the macOS Dock. A macOS-only API exists to create a custom dock menu, but Electron also uses the app dock icon as the entry point for cross-platform features like recent documents and application progress.
trans-unit.target: Electron具有用于在macOS Dock中配置应用程序图标的API。存在一个仅限macOS的API来创建自定义停靠菜单，但是Electron还将app停靠图标用作跨平台功能（例如最新文档和应用程序进度）的入口点。

trans-unit.source: Electron has APIs to configure the app's icon in the macOS Dock. A macOS-only API exists to create a custom dock menu, but Electron also uses the app's dock icon to implement cross-platform features like recent documents and application progress.
trans-unit.target: Electron具有用于在macOS Dock中配置应用程序图标的API。存在一个仅限macOS的API来创建自定义停靠菜单，但是Electron还使用该应用的停靠图标来实现跨平台功能，例如最近的文档和应用程序进度。

trans-unit.source: Electron has its own Node fork with modifications for the V8 build details mentioned above and for exposing API needed by Electron. Once an upstream Node release is chosen, it's placed in a branch in Electron's Node fork and any Electron Node patches are applied there.
trans-unit.target: Electron拥有自己的Node分支，并对上述V8构建细节进行了修改，并公开了Electron所需的API。选择上游节点版本后，将其放置在Electron的Node分支的分支中，并在此处应用任何Electron Node补丁。

trans-unit.source: Electron includes a hardcoded API key for making requests to Google's geocoding webservice. Because this API key is included in every version of Electron, it often exceeds its usage quota. To work around this, you can supply your own Google API key in the environment. Place the following code in your main process file, before opening any browser windows that will make geocoding requests:
trans-unit.target: Electron包含了一个硬编码的API密钥,用于向Google的地理编码网络服务发出请求。由于每个版本的Electron都包含了这个API密钥,所以它经常会超过它的使用配额。为了解决这个问题,你可以在环境中提供自己的Google API密钥。在打开任何会发出地理编码请求的浏览器窗口之前,将以下代码放在你的主进程文件中。

trans-unit.source: Electron includes support for a subset of Node's NODE_OPTIONS. The majority are supported with the exception of those which conflict with Chromium's use of BoringSSL.
trans-unit.target: Electron包括对Node的 NODE_OPTIONS 子集的支持。除Chromium与BoringSSL的使用冲突外，大多数都受支持。

trans-unit.source: Electron inherits this build option from Chromium. In Debug builds, the binary will be linked to a shared library version of Chromium's components to achieve fast linking time; for Release builds, the binary will be linked to the static library versions, so we can have the best possible binary size and performance.
trans-unit.target: Electron从Chromium继承了此构建选项。在 Debug 版本中，二进制文件将链接到Chromium组件的共享库版本，以实现快速链接。对于 Release 版本，二进制文件将链接到静态库版本，因此我们可以拥有最佳的二进制文件大小和性能。

trans-unit.source: Electron is a framework that enables you to create desktop applications with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS. These applications can then be packaged to run directly on macOS, Windows, or Linux, or distributed via the Mac App Store or the Microsoft Store.
trans-unit.target: Electron是一个框架,它可以让你用JavaScript、HTML和CSS创建桌面应用程序,然后将这些应用程序打包,直接在macOS、Windows或Linux上运行,或通过Mac App Store或Microsoft Store发布。这些应用程序可以被打包直接运行在macOS、Windows或Linux上,或者通过Mac App Store或Microsoft Store发布。

trans-unit.source: Electron is maintained by a team at GitHub as well as a group of active contributors from the community. Some of the contributors are individuals and some work at larger companies who are developing on Electron. We're happy to add frequent contributors to the project as maintainers. Read more about contributing to Electron.
trans-unit.target: Electron由GitHub上的团队以及社区中的一群积极贡献者维护。一些贡献者是个人，一些贡献者是在Electron上发展的大型公司。我们很高兴为项目增加经常的贡献者。阅读有关为Electron做出贡献的更多信息。

trans-unit.source: Electron keeps all its patches in libcc because it’s simpler than maintaining different repos for patches for each upstream project.
trans-unit.target: Electron将所有修补程序都保存在libcc中，因为它比为每个上游项目为修补程序维护不同的存储库更简单。

trans-unit.source: Electron keeps up to date with alternating Chromium releases. For more information, see the Electron Release Cadence blog post.
trans-unit.target: 电子不断更新铬的释放情况。有关更多信息，请参见Electron Release Cadence博客文章。

trans-unit.source: Electron links with different sets of libraries in Release and Debug builds. gyp, however, doesn't support configuring different link settings for different configurations.
trans-unit.target: 电子 Release 与发行版和 Debug 版中的不同库集链接。 gyp 但是不支持为不同的配置配置不同的链接设置。

trans-unit.source: Electron makes sure that as long as the remote object in the renderer process lives (in other words, has not been garbage collected), the corresponding object in the main process will not be released. When the remote object has been garbage collected, the corresponding object in the main process will be dereferenced.
trans-unit.target: Electron确保只要渲染器进程中的远程对象还活着(换句话说,没有被垃圾回收),主进程中的相应对象就不会被释放。当远程对象被垃圾回收后,主进程中的对应对象将被解除引用。

trans-unit.source: Electron no longer supports the Pepper Flash plugin, as Chrome has removed support.
trans-unit.target: Electron不再支持Pepper Flash插件,因为Chrome已经取消了支持。

trans-unit.source: Electron non-breaking API changes
trans-unit.target: 电子非破损API变化

trans-unit.source: Electron offers a number of APIs that support the development of a desktop application in both the main process and the renderer process. In both processes, you'd access Electron's APIs by requiring its included module:
trans-unit.target: Electron提供了许多API,支持在主进程和渲染进程中开发桌面应用程序。在这两个过程中,你都需要通过Electron包含的模块来访问Electron的API。

trans-unit.source: Electron only supports a limited set of chrome.* APIs, so some extensions using unsupported chrome.* APIs for chrome extension features may not work. Following Devtools Extensions are tested and guaranteed to work in Electron:
trans-unit.target: Electron仅支持一组有限的 chrome.* API，因此某些使用不受支持的 chrome.* 扩展名可能无法使用chrome扩展功能的API。以下Devtools扩展程序已经过测试，并保证可以在Electron中使用：

trans-unit.source: Electron respects the Content-Security-Policy HTTP header which can be set using Electron's webRequest.onHeadersReceived handler:
trans-unit.target: Electron遵守 Content-Security-Policy HTTP标头，可以使用Electron的 webRequest.onHeadersReceived 处理程序进行设置：

trans-unit.source: Electron sets some variables in your environment at runtime.
trans-unit.target: Electron在运行时设置了一些环境变量。

trans-unit.source: Electron ships with a version of ffmpeg that includes proprietary codecs by default. A version without these codecs is built and distributed with each release as well. Each Chrome upgrade should verify that switching this version is still supported.
trans-unit.target: Electron随附 ffmpeg 版本，默认情况下包含专有编解码器。没有这些编解码器的版本也会随每个发行版一起构建和分发。每次Chrome升级都应验证是否仍支持切换此版本。

trans-unit.source: Electron supports Mac OS X 10.9 (and all versions named macOS) and up. Apple does not allow running macOS in virtual machines unless the host computer is already an Apple computer, so if you find yourself in need of a Mac, consider using a cloud service that rents access to Macs (like MacInCloud or xcloud).
trans-unit.target: Electron支持Mac OS X 10.9（以及所有名为macOS的版本）及更高版本。除非主机已经是Apple计算机，否则Apple不允许在虚拟机中运行macOS，因此，如果您发现自己需要Mac，请考虑使用租用Mac的云服务（如MacInCloud或xcloud）。

trans-unit.source: Electron supports Windows 7 and later versions – attempting to develop Electron applications on earlier versions of Windows will not work. Microsoft provides free virtual machine images with Windows 10 for developers.
trans-unit.target: Electron支持Windows 7和更高版本–尝试在Windows的早期版本上开发Electron应用程序无效。Microsoft 通过Windows 10为开发人员提供免费的虚拟机映像。

trans-unit.source: Electron supports macOS 10.10 (Yosemite) and up. Apple does not allow running macOS in virtual machines unless the host computer is already an Apple computer, so if you find yourself in need of a Mac, consider using a cloud service that rents access to Macs (like MacInCloud or xcloud).
trans-unit.target: Electron支持macOS 10.10（Yosemite）及更高版本。除非主机已经是Apple计算机，否则Apple不允许在虚拟机中运行macOS，因此，如果您发现自己需要Mac，请考虑使用租用Mac的云服务（如MacInCloud或xcloud）。

trans-unit.source: Electron supports the Chrome DevTools Extension, which can be used to extend the ability of devtools for debugging popular web frameworks.
trans-unit.target: Electron支持Chrome DevTools扩展程序，该扩展程序可用于扩展devtools的功能，以调试流行的Web框架。

trans-unit.source: Electron supports the Pepper Flash plugin. To use the Pepper Flash plugin in Electron, you should manually specify the location of the Pepper Flash plugin and then enable it in your application.
trans-unit.target: Electron支持Pepper Flash插件。要在Electron中使用Pepper Flash插件,您需要手动指定Pepper Flash插件的位置,然后在您的应用程序中启用它。

trans-unit.source: Electron uses GN for project generation and ninja for building. Project configurations can be found in the .gn and .gni files.
trans-unit.target: Electron使用GN进行项目生成，使用忍者进行建筑。项目配置可以在 .gn 和 .gni 文件中找到。

trans-unit.source: Electron uses gyp for project generation and ninja for building. Project configurations can be found in the .gyp and .gypi files.
trans-unit.target: Electron使用gyp进行项目生成，使用忍者进行建筑。可以在 .gyp 和 .gypi 文件中找到项目配置。

trans-unit.source: Electron uses Chromium's l10n_util library to fetch the locale. Possible values are listed below:
trans-unit.target: Electron使用Chromium的 l10n_util 库来获取语言环境。可能的值在下面列出：

trans-unit.source: Electron uses following cryptographic algorithms:
trans-unit.target: Electron使用以下加密算法。

trans-unit.source: Electron uses the same technology as Chromium's Content Scripts to enable this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Electron使用与Chromium的内容脚本相同的技术来实现此行为。

trans-unit.source: Electron versions < 2.0 did not conform to the semver spec: major versions corresponded to end-user API changes, minor versions corresponded to Chromium major releases, and patch versions corresponded to new features and bug fixes. While convenient for developers merging features, it creates problems for developers of client-facing applications. The QA testing cycles of major apps like Slack, Stride, Teams, Skype, VS Code, Atom, and Desktop can be lengthy and stability is a highly desired outcome. There is a high risk in adopting new features while trying to absorb bug fixes.
trans-unit.target: <2.0版电子版本不符合semver规范：主要版本对应于最终用户API的更改，次要版本对应于Chromium的主要版本，补丁版本对应于新功能和错误修复。虽然对于开发人员合并功能很方便，但它给面向客户端的应用程序的开发人员带来了问题。Slack，Stride，Teams，Skype，VS Code，Atom和Desktop等主要应用程序的质量检查测试周期可能会很长，因此稳定性是非常需要的结果。在尝试吸收错误修复程序时采用新功能存在很高的风险。

trans-unit.source: Electron versions < 2.0 did not conform to the semver spec: major versions corresponded to end-user API changes, minor versions corresponded to Chromium major releases, and patch versions corresponded to new features and bug fixes. While convenient for developers merging features, it creates problems for developers of client-facing applications. The QA testing cycles of major apps like Slack, Stride, Teams, Skype, VS Code, Atom, and Desktop can be lengthy and stability is a highly desired outcome. There is a high risk in adopting new features while trying to absorb bug fixes.
trans-unit.target: <2.0版电子版本不符合semver规范：主要版本对应于最终用户API的更改，次要版本对应于Chromium主要版本，补丁版本对应于新功能和错误修复。虽然对于开发人员合并功能很方便，但是它给面向客户端的应用程序的开发人员带来了问题。 Slack，Stride，Teams，Skype，VS Code，Atom和Desktop等主要应用程序的质量检查测试周期可能会很长，因此稳定性是非常需要的结果。在尝试吸收错误修复程序时采用新功能存在很高的风险。

trans-unit.source: Electron will listen for V8 inspector protocol messages on the specified port, an external debugger will need to connect on this port. The default port is 5858.
trans-unit.target: Electron将在指定 port 上侦听V8检查器协议消息，需要在该端口上连接外部调试器。默认 port 是 5858 。

trans-unit.source: Electron works more like the Node.js runtime. Electron's APIs are lower level so you can use it for browser testing in place of PhantomJS.
trans-unit.target: Electron的工作方式更像Node.js运行时。Electron的API级别较低，因此您可以使用它代替PhantomJS进行浏览器测试。

trans-unit.source: Electron's process object is extended from the Node.js process object. It adds the following events, properties, and methods:
trans-unit.target: Electron的 process 对象是从Node.js process 对象扩展的。它添加了以下事件，属性和方法：

trans-unit.source: Electron's webview tag is based on Chromium's webview, which is undergoing dramatic architectural changes. This impacts the stability of webviews, including rendering, navigation, and event routing. We currently recommend to not use the webview tag and to consider alternatives, like iframe, Electron's BrowserView, or an architecture that avoids embedded content altogether.
trans-unit.target: Electron的 webview 标签基于Chromium的 webview ，它正在发生巨大的架构变化。这会影响 webviews 的稳定性，包括渲染，导航和事件路由。当前，我们建议不要使用 webview 标记，而应考虑使用其他替代方案，例如 iframe ，Electron的 BrowserView 或完全避免嵌入内容的体系结构。

trans-unit.source: Electron's ecosystem favors configuration and freedom, so there are multiple ways to get your application signed and notarized.
trans-unit.target: Electron的生态系统有利于配置和自由,因此有多种方式让您的申请得到签署和公证。

trans-unit.source: Electron's version of Chromium is usually updated within one or two weeks after a new stable Chromium version is released, depending on the effort involved in the upgrade.
trans-unit.target: Electron的Chromium版本通常会在新的稳定版Chromium发布后的一到两周内更新,这取决于升级过程中的努力。

trans-unit.source: Electron-forge creates the out folder where your package will be located:
trans-unit.target: Electron-forge创建包所在的 out 文件夹：

trans-unit.source: Ember Inspector
trans-unit.target: 微光检查员

trans-unit.source: Emitted after a server side redirect occurs during navigation. For example a 302 redirect.
trans-unit.target: 在导航过程中发生服务器端重定向后发出。例如302重定向。

trans-unit.source: Emitted after the window has been resized.
trans-unit.target: 窗口调整大小后发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted as a server side redirect occurs during navigation. For example a 302 redirect.
trans-unit.target: 作为导航过程中发生的服务器端重定向发出。例如302重定向。

trans-unit.source: Emitted as soon as the systems screen is unlocked.
trans-unit.target: 在系统屏幕解锁后立即发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted as the last event in the HTTP request-response transaction. The close event indicates that no more events will be emitted on either the request or response objects.
trans-unit.target: 作为HTTP请求-响应事务中的最后一个事件发出。的 close 事件表示没有更多的事件将在任一发出 request 或 response 的对象。

trans-unit.source: Emitted before dispatching the keydown and keyup events in the page. Calling event.preventDefault will prevent the page keydown/keyup events and the menu shortcuts.
trans-unit.target: 在调度页面中的 keydown 和 keyup 事件之前发出。调用 event.preventDefault 将阻止页面 keydown / keyup 事件和菜单快捷方式。

trans-unit.source: Emitted before the application starts closing its windows. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the default behavior, which is terminating the application.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序开始关闭其窗口之前发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止默认行为，该行为将终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Emitted before the application starts closing its windows. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the default behaviour, which is terminating the application.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序开始关闭其窗口之前发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止默认行为，该行为将终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Emitted before the window is moved. On Windows, calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the window from being moved.
trans-unit.target: 在移动窗口之前发出。在Windows上，调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止移动窗口。

trans-unit.source: Emitted before the window is resized. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the window from being resized.
trans-unit.target: 在调整窗口大小之前发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将防止调整窗口大小。

trans-unit.source: Emitted during Handoff after an activity from this device was successfully resumed on another one.
trans-unit.target: 在另一设备上成功恢复了该设备的活动后，在越区切换期间发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted during Handoff before an activity from a different device wants to be resumed. You should call event.preventDefault() if you want to handle this event.
trans-unit.target: 在切换期间发出的呼叫，要恢复其他设备的活动之前发出。如果要处理此事件，应调用 event.preventDefault() 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted during Handoff when an activity from a different device fails to be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 切换期间发出的，来自其他设备的活动无法恢复时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted during Handoff when an activity from a different device wants to be resumed. You should call event.preventDefault() if you want to handle this event.
trans-unit.target: 在切换期间发射时，要恢复来自其他设备的活动。如果要处理此事件，应调用 event.preventDefault() 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted just after the last chunk of the request's data has been written into the request object.
trans-unit.target: 在将 request 的最后一块数据写入 request 对象之后立即发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted on 3-finger swipe. Possible directions are up, right, down, left.
trans-unit.target: 在三指滑动时发出。可能的方向是 up ， right ， down ， left 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted on trackpad rotation gesture. Continually emitted until rotation gesture is ended. The rotation value on each emission is the angle in degrees rotated since the last emission. The last emitted event upon a rotation gesture will always be of value 0. Counter-clockwise rotation values are positive, while clockwise ones are negative.
trans-unit.target: 在触控板旋转手势上发出。持续发射直到旋转手势结束。每个发射的 rotation 值是自上次发射以来以度为单位旋转的角度。旋转手势上最后发出的事件将始终为值 0 。逆时针旋转值为正，而顺时针旋转值为负。

trans-unit.source: Emitted once when the window has finished being resized.
trans-unit.target: 窗口大小调整完毕后发出一次。

trans-unit.source: Emitted once when the window is moved to a new position.
trans-unit.target: 窗口移动到新的位置时发出一次。

trans-unit.source: Emitted once, when Electron has finished initializing. On macOS, launchInfo holds the userInfo of the NSUserNotification that was used to open the application, if it was launched from Notification Center. You can also call app.isReady() to check if this event has already fired and app.whenReady() to get a Promise that is fulfilled when Electron is initialized.
trans-unit.target: 当Electron完成初始化后，发射一次。在macOS上， launchInfo 保存用于打开应用程序的 NSUserNotification 的 userInfo （如果它是从Notification Center启动的）。您还可以调用 app.isReady() 来检查此事件是否已经触发，以及 app.whenReady() 来获取在初始化Electron时实现的Promise。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when Handoff is about to be resumed on another device. If you need to update the state to be transferred, you should call event.preventDefault() immediately, construct a new userInfo dictionary and call app.updateCurrentActivity() in a timely manner. Otherwise, the operation will fail and continue-activity-error will be called.
trans-unit.target: 在即将在另一台设备上恢复越区切换时发出。如果需要更新要传输的状态，则应立即调用 event.preventDefault() ，构造一个新的 userInfo 字典，并及时调用 app.updateCurrentActivity() 。否则，操作将失败，并会调用 continue-activity-error 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when Handoff is about to be resumed on another device. If you need to update the state to be transferred, you should call event.preventDefault() immediately, construct a new userInfo dictionary and call app.updateCurrentActiviy() in a timely manner. Otherwise the operation will fail and continue-activity-error will be called.
trans-unit.target: 在即将在另一台设备上恢复越区切换时发出。如果需要更新要传输的状态，则应立即调用 event.preventDefault() ，构造一个新的 userInfo 字典，并及时调用 app.updateCurrentActiviy() 。否则，操作将失败，并会调用 continue-activity-error 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when desktopCapturer.getSources() is called in the renderer process of webContents. Calling event.preventDefault() will make it return empty sources.
trans-unit.target: 发射时 desktopCapturer.getSources() 被调用的渲染程序进程 webContents 。调用 event.preventDefault() 将使其返回空源。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when desktopCapturer.getSources() is called in the renderer process. Calling event.preventDefault() will make it return empty sources.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程中调用 desktopCapturer.getSources() 时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将使其返回空源。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when menu.popup() is called.
trans-unit.target: 在 menu.popup() 时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when newDisplay has been added.
trans-unit.target: 添加 newDisplay 时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when oldDisplay has been removed.
trans-unit.target: 删除 oldDisplay 时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getBuiltin() is called in the renderer process of webContents. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the module from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在 remote.getBuiltin() 的呈现器过程中调用remote.getBuiltin（）时 webContents 。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止模块返回。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getBuiltin() is called in the renderer process. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the module from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程中调用 remote.getBuiltin() 时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止模块返回。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getCurrentWebContents() is called in the renderer process of webContents. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the object from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在 remote.getCurrentWebContents() 的呈现器过程中调用remote.getCurrentWebContents（）时 webContents 。调用 event.preventDefault() 将防止返回该对象。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getCurrentWebContents() is called in the renderer process. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the object from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程中调用 remote.getCurrentWebContents() 时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将防止返回该对象。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getCurrentWindow() is called in the renderer process of webContents. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the object from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在 remote.getCurrentWindow() 的呈现器过程中调用remote.getCurrentWindow（）时 webContents 。调用 event.preventDefault() 将防止返回该对象。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getCurrentWindow() is called in the renderer process. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the object from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程中调用 remote.getCurrentWindow() 时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将防止返回该对象。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getGlobal() is called in the renderer process of webContents. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the global from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在 remote.getGlobal() 的呈现器过程中调用remote.getGlobal（）时 webContents 。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止返回全局变量。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.getGlobal() is called in the renderer process. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the global from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程中调用 remote.getGlobal() 时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止返回全局变量。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.require() is called in the renderer process of webContents. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the module from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 发射时 remote.require() 被调用的渲染程序进程 webContents 。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止模块返回。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when remote.require() is called in the renderer process. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the module from being returned. Custom value can be returned by setting event.returnValue.
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程中调用 remote.require() 时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止模块返回。可以通过设置 event.returnValue 返回自定义值。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when webContents is destroyed.
trans-unit.target: 当 webContents 被销毁时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when webContents wants to do basic auth.
trans-unit.target: 当 webContents 要执行基本身份验证时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when Chrome's accessibility support changes. This event fires when assistive technologies, such as screen readers, are enabled or disabled. See https://www.chromium.org/developers/design-documents/accessibility for more details.
trans-unit.target: 当Chrome的辅助功能支持发生更改时发出。启用或禁用辅助技术（例如屏幕阅读器）时，将触发此事件。有关更多详细信息，请参见https://www.chromium.org/developers/design-documents/accessibility。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when DevTools is closed.
trans-unit.target: DevTools关闭时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when DevTools is focused / opened.
trans-unit.target: 当DevTools被聚焦/打开时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when DevTools is opened.
trans-unit.target: 打开DevTools时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when Electron has created a new session.
trans-unit.target: 在Electron创建新 session 时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when Electron has finished initializing. On macOS, launchInfo holds the userInfo of the NSUserNotification that was used to open the application, if it was launched from Notification Center. You can call app.isReady() to check if this event has already fired.
trans-unit.target: 当电子完成初始化时发出。在macOS上， launchInfo 包含用于打开应用程序的 NSUserNotification 的 userInfo （如果它是从Notification Center启动的）。您可以调用 app.isReady() 来检查此事件是否已经触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when Electron has loaded its internal initialization script and is beginning to load the web page or the main script.
trans-unit.target: 当Electron加载了内部初始化脚本并开始加载网页或主脚本时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when Electron is about to download item in webContents.
trans-unit.target: 当Electron将要下载 webContents 中的 item 时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a browserWindow gets blurred.
trans-unit.target: 当browserWindow模糊时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a browserWindow gets focused.
trans-unit.target: 当browserWindow获得焦点时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a <webview> has been attached to this web contents.
trans-unit.target: 当 <webview> 附加到此Web内容时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a <webview>'s web contents is being attached to this web contents. Calling event.preventDefault() will destroy the guest page.
trans-unit.target: 当 <webview> 的Web内容附加到此Web内容时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将破坏访客页面。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a beforeunload event handler is attempting to cancel a page unload.
trans-unit.target: 在 beforeunload 事件处理程序尝试取消页面卸载时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a client certificate is requested.
trans-unit.target: 申请客户证书时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a cookie is changed because it was added, edited, removed, or expired.
trans-unit.target: 当cookie因被添加、编辑、删除或过期而发生变化时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a drag operation ends on the tray or ends at another location.
trans-unit.target: 当拖动操作在托盘上结束或在其他位置结束时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a drag operation enters the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 当拖动操作进入托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a drag operation exits the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 当拖动操作退出托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a frame has done navigation.
trans-unit.target: 当一个框架完成导航后发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a hunspell dictionary file download fails. For details on the failure you should collect a netlog and inspect the download request.
trans-unit.target: 当 hunspell 字典文件下载失败时发出。关于失败的细节,你应该收集一个netlog并检查下载请求。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a hunspell dictionary file has been successfully downloaded
trans-unit.target: 当一个 hunspell 字典文件被成功下载时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a hunspell dictionary file has been successfully initialized. This occurs after the file has been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 当 hunspell 字典文件已成功初始化时发出。这发生在文件被下载后。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a hunspell dictionary file starts downloading
trans-unit.target: 当hunspell词典文件开始下载时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a main frame navigation is done.
trans-unit.target: 主帧导航完成后发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a navigation is done.
trans-unit.target: 导航完成后发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a new browserWindow is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的browserWindow时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a new webContents is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新的webContents时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a new frame is generated. Only the dirty area is passed in the buffer.
trans-unit.target: 生成新帧时发出。缓冲区中只传递脏区域。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a page's theme color changes. This is usually due to encountering a meta tag:
trans-unit.target: 当页面的主题颜色改变时发出。这通常是由于遇到了元标签。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a plugin process has crashed.
trans-unit.target: 当插件进程崩溃时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a popup is closed either manually or with menu.closePopup().
trans-unit.target: 在手动或通过 menu.closePopup() 关闭弹出窗口时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a redirect is received while requesting a resource.
trans-unit.target: 在请求资源时收到重定向时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a render process requests preconnection to a URL, generally due to a resource hint.
trans-unit.target: 通常由于资源提示，在渲染过程请求与URL的预连接时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a request has been canceled during an ongoing HTTP transaction.
trans-unit.target: 在进行中的HTTP事务中请求被取消时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a result is available for [webContents.findInPage] request.
trans-unit.target: 当结果可用于[ webContents.findInPage ]请求时触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when a user or the page wants to start navigation. It can happen when the window.location object is changed or a user clicks a link in the page.
trans-unit.target: 当用户或页面要开始导航时发出。更改 window.location 对象或用户单击页面中的链接时，可能会发生这种情况。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when all windows have been closed and the application will quit. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the default behavior, which is terminating the application.
trans-unit.target: 当所有窗口都关闭并且应用程序退出时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止默认行为，该行为将终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when all windows have been closed and the application will quit. Calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the default behaviour, which is terminating the application.
trans-unit.target: 当所有窗口都关闭并且应用程序退出时发出。调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止默认行为，该行为将终止应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when all windows have been closed.
trans-unit.target: 当所有窗户都关闭时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an App Command is invoked. These are typically related to keyboard media keys or browser commands, as well as the "Back" button built into some mice on Windows.
trans-unit.target: 在调用应用程序命令时发出。这些通常与键盘媒体键或浏览器命令以及Windows某些鼠标中内置的“后退”按钮有关。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an authenticating proxy is asking for user credentials.
trans-unit.target: 当认证代理请求用户凭证时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an error was encountered while streaming response data events. For instance, if the server closes the underlying while the response is still streaming, an error event will be emitted on the response object and a close event will subsequently follow on the request object.
trans-unit.target: 在流式传输响应数据事件时遇到错误时发出。例如，如果服务器在响应仍在流式传输时关闭基础，则将在响应对象上发出 error 事件，然后在请求对象上发生 close 事件。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an in-page navigation happened in any frame.
trans-unit.target: 当任何框架内发生页面内导航时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an in-page navigation happened.
trans-unit.target: 发生页内导航时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when an update has been downloaded.
trans-unit.target: 下载更新时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when any dragged items are dropped on the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 当任何被拖动的物品掉落在托盘图标上时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when any frame (including main) starts navigating. isInplace will be true for in-page navigations.
trans-unit.target: 当任何框架（包括主框架）开始导航时发出。 isInplace 对于页内导航将为 true 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when any frame navigation is done.
trans-unit.target: 在进行任何框架导航时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when bluetooth device needs to be selected on call to navigator.bluetooth.requestDevice. To use navigator.bluetooth api webBluetooth should be enabled. If event.preventDefault is not called, first available device will be selected. callback should be called with deviceId to be selected, passing empty string to callback will cancel the request.
trans-unit.target: 在调用 navigator.bluetooth.requestDevice 时需要选择蓝牙设备时发出。要使用 navigator.bluetooth api，应启用 webBluetooth 。如果未调用 event.preventDefault ，则将选择第一个可用设备。 callback 应使用 deviceId 进行选择，将空字符串传递给 callback 将取消请求。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when checking if an update has started.
trans-unit.target: 检查更新是否已经开始时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when debugging session is terminated. This happens either when webContents is closed or devtools is invoked for the attached webContents.
trans-unit.target: 调试会话终止时发出。这是在关闭 webContents 或为附加的 webContents 调用devtools 时发生的。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when details regarding a requested resource are available. status indicates the socket connection to download the resource.
trans-unit.target: 当有关请求资源的详细信息可用时发出。 status 指示用于下载资源的套接字连接。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when dragged files are dropped in the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 当拖动的文件被放入托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when dragged text is dropped in the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 当拖动的文字被放置在托盘图标中时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when failed to verify the certificate for url, to trust the certificate you should prevent the default behavior with event.preventDefault() and call callback(true).
trans-unit.target: 在无法验证 certificate 的 url 时发出，要信任该证书，应使用 event.preventDefault() 防止默认行为，并调用 callback(true) 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when failed to verify the certificate for url.
trans-unit.target: 当无法验证发出 certificate 的 url 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when mac application become active. Difference from activate event is that did-become-active is emitted every time the app becomes active, not only when Dock icon is clicked or application is re-launched.
trans-unit.target: 当mac应用程序变为活动状态时发出。与 activate 事件的不同之处在于，不仅在单击Dock图标或重新启动应用程序时，应用程序每次 did-become-active 都会发出did-become-active。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when media is paused or done playing.
trans-unit.target: 媒体暂停或播放完毕时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when media starts playing.
trans-unit.target: 媒体开始播放时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when mouse moves over a link or the keyboard moves the focus to a link.
trans-unit.target: 当鼠标移动到某个链接上或键盘将焦点移动到某个链接上时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when one or more metrics change in a display. The changedMetrics is an array of strings that describe the changes. Possible changes are bounds, workArea, scaleFactor and rotation.
trans-unit.target: 当一个或多个度量标准在 display 更改时发出。的 changedMetrics 是描述该改变字符串的数组。可能的变化是 bounds ， workArea ， scaleFactor 和 rotation 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when one or more transactions have been updated.
trans-unit.target: 当一个或多个交易被更新时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when page receives favicon urls.
trans-unit.target: 当页面收到favicon urls时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when scroll wheel event phase filed upon reaching the edge of element.
trans-unit.target: 当滚轮事件相位到达元素的边缘时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when scroll wheel event phase has begun.
trans-unit.target: 滚轮事件阶段开始时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when scroll wheel event phase has ended.
trans-unit.target: 滚轮事件阶段结束时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when system changes to battery power.
trans-unit.target: 系统改为电池供电时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when system is resuming.
trans-unit.target: 系统恢复时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the net module fails to issue a network request. Typically when the request object emits an error event, a close event will subsequently follow and no response object will be provided.
trans-unit.target: 当 net 模块无法发出网络请求时发出。通常，当 request 对象发出 error 事件时，随后将发生 close 事件，并且将不提供响应对象。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the request is aborted. The abort event will not be fired if the request is already closed.
trans-unit.target: 当 request 中止时发出。该 abort 如果事件不会被解雇 request 已经关闭。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the GPU process crashes or is killed.
trans-unit.target: 当GPU进程崩溃或被杀死时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the application has finished basic startup. On Windows and Linux, the will-finish-launching event is the same as the ready event; on macOS, this event represents the applicationWillFinishLaunching notification of NSApplication. You would usually set up listeners for the open-file and open-url events here, and start the crash reporter and auto updater.
trans-unit.target: 当应用程序完成基本启动时发出。在Windows和Linux上， will-finish-launching 事件与 ready 事件相同；在macOS上，此事件表示 NSApplication 的 applicationWillFinishLaunching 通知。通常，您将在此处为 open-file 和 open-url 事件设置侦听器，然后启动崩溃报告程序和自动更新程序。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the application is activated. Various actions can trigger this event, such as launching the application for the first time, attempting to re-launch the application when it's already running, or clicking on the application's dock or taskbar icon.
trans-unit.target: 在应用程序被激活时发出。各种操作都可以触发该事件,例如第一次启动应用程序,在应用程序已经运行时试图重新启动应用程序,或点击应用程序的停靠点或任务栏图标。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the application is quitting.
trans-unit.target: 应用退出时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the associated window logs a console message.
trans-unit.target: 当相关窗口记录控制台消息时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the associated window logs a console message. Will not be emitted for windows with offscreen rendering enabled.
trans-unit.target: 当关联的窗口记录控制台消息时发出。对于启用了屏幕外渲染的窗口将不会发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the child process unexpectedly disappears. This is normally because it was crashed or killed. It does not include renderer processes.
trans-unit.target: 当子进程意外消失时发出。这通常是因为它被崩溃或被杀死。它不包括渲染器进程。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the cursor's type changes. The type parameter can be default, crosshair, pointer, text, wait, help, e-resize, n-resize, ne-resize, nw-resize, s-resize, se-resize, sw-resize, w-resize, ns-resize, ew-resize, nesw-resize, nwse-resize, col-resize, row-resize, m-panning, e-panning, n-panning, ne-panning, nw-panning, s-panning, se-panning, sw-panning, w-panning, move, vertical-text, cell, context-menu, alias, progress, nodrop, copy, none, not-allowed, zoom-in, zoom-out, grab, grabbing or custom.
trans-unit.target: 当光标的类型更改时发出。该 type 参数可以是 default ， crosshair ， pointer ， text ， wait ， help ， e-resize ， n-resize ， ne-resize ， nw-resize ， s-resize ， se-resize ， sw-resize ， w-resize ， ns-resize ， ew-resize ， nwse-resize nesw-resize ，nwse-resize， col-resize ， row-resize ， m-panning ， e-panning ， n-panning ， ne-panning ， nw-panning ， s-panning ， se-panning ， sw-panning ， w-panning ， move ， vertical-text ， cell ， context-menu ， alias ， progress ， nodrop ， copy ， none ， not-allowed ， zoom-in ， zoom-out ， grab ， grabbing 或 custom 。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the debugging session is terminated. This happens either when webContents is closed or devtools is invoked for the attached webContents.
trans-unit.target: 在调试会话终止时发出。这是在关闭 webContents 或为附加的 webContents 调用devtools时发生的。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the devtools window instructs the webContents to reload
trans-unit.target: 当devtools窗口指示webContents重新加载时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the document changed its title, calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the native window's title from changing.
trans-unit.target: 当文档更改标题时发出，调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止更改本机窗口的标题。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the document changed its title, calling event.preventDefault() will prevent the native window's title from changing. explicitSet is false when title is synthesized from file URL.
trans-unit.target: 当文档更改其标题时发出，调用 event.preventDefault() 将阻止更改本机窗口的标题。从文件URL合成标题时， explicitSet 为false。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the document in the given frame is loaded.
trans-unit.target: 当给定框架中的文档被加载时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the download has been updated and is not done.
trans-unit.target: 当下载已更新且未完成时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the download is in a terminal state. This includes a completed download, a cancelled download (via downloadItem.cancel()), and interrupted download that can't be resumed.
trans-unit.target: 当下载处于终端状态时发出。这包括完成下载，取消下载（通过 downloadItem.cancel() ）以及无法恢复的中断下载。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the gpu process crashes or is killed.
trans-unit.target: gpu进程崩溃或被杀时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse clicks the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标点击托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse enters the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标进入托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse exits the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标离开托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse is released from clicking the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 点击托盘图标释放鼠标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the mouse moves in the tray icon.
trans-unit.target: 鼠标在托盘图标中移动时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the native new tab button is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 点击原生新标签按钮时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the navigation is done, i.e. the spinner of the tab has stopped spinning, and the onload event was dispatched.
trans-unit.target: 导航完成时发出，即选项卡的微调器停止旋转并调度 onload 事件时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the notification is clicked by the user.
trans-unit.target: 当用户点击通知时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the notification is closed by manual intervention from the user.
trans-unit.target: 当用户手动干预关闭通知时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the notification is shown to the user, note this could be fired multiple times as a notification can be shown multiple times through the show() method.
trans-unit.target: 在通知显示给用户时发出，请注意，由于可以通过 show() 方法多次显示通知，因此可以多次触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the page requests to open a new window for a url. It could be requested by window.open or an external link like <a target='_blank'>.
trans-unit.target: 当页面请求打开 url 的新窗口时触发。可以通过 window.open 或诸如 <a target='_blank'> 之类的外部链接来请求。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the preload script preloadPath throws an unhandled exception error.
trans-unit.target: 当预加载脚本 preloadPath 引发未处理的异常 error 时触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the renderer process crashes or is killed.
trans-unit.target: 当渲染器进程崩溃或被杀死时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the renderer process of webContents crashes or is killed.
trans-unit.target: 当 webContents 的渲染器进程崩溃或被杀死时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the renderer process sends a synchronous message via ipcRenderer.sendSync().
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程通过 ipcRenderer.sendSync() 发送同步消息时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the renderer process sends an asynchronous message via ipcRenderer.send().
trans-unit.target: 在渲染器进程通过 ipcRenderer.send() 发送异步消息时触发。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the renderer process unexpectedly disappears. This is normally because it was crashed or killed.
trans-unit.target: 当渲染器进程意外消失时发出。这通常是因为渲染器崩溃或被杀死。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the server returns a redirect response (e.g. 301 Moved Permanently). Calling request.followRedirect will continue with the redirection. If this event is handled, request.followRedirect must be called synchronously, otherwise the request will be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 服务器返回重定向响应（例如301永久移动）时发出。调用 request.followRedirect 将继续进行重定向。如果处理了此事件，则必须同步调用 request.followRedirect ，否则请求将被取消。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the system changes to AC power.
trans-unit.target: 系统转换为交流电时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the system context menu is triggered on the window, this is normally only triggered when the user right clicks on the non-client area of your window. This is the window titlebar or any area you have declared as -webkit-app-region: drag in a frameless window.
trans-unit.target: 在窗口上触发系统上下文菜单时发出，通常仅在用户右键单击窗口的非客户区域时才触发。这是窗口标题栏或您已声明为 -webkit-app-region: drag 任何区域：在无框架窗口中拖动。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the system is about to lock the screen.
trans-unit.target: 当系统即将锁定屏幕时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the system is about to reboot or shut down. If the event handler invokes e.preventDefault(), Electron will attempt to delay system shutdown in order for the app to exit cleanly. If e.preventDefault() is called, the app should exit as soon as possible by calling something like app.quit().
trans-unit.target: 在系统即将重新引导或关闭时发出。如果事件处理程序调用 e.preventDefault() ，Electron将尝试延迟系统关闭，以使应用程序正常退出。如果 e.preventDefault() ，则应用程序应通过调用类似 app.quit() 的方式尽快退出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the system is suspending.
trans-unit.target: 系统暂停时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the tray balloon is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 点击托盘气球时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the tray balloon is closed because of timeout or user manually closes it.
trans-unit.target: 当托盘气球因超时关闭或用户手动关闭时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the tray balloon shows.
trans-unit.target: 当托盘气球显示时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the tray icon is clicked.
trans-unit.target: 点击托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the tray icon is double clicked.
trans-unit.target: 双击托盘图标时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the tray icon is right clicked.
trans-unit.target: 当托盘图标被右击时发出。

trans-unit.source: Emitted when the unresponsive web page becomes responsive again.
trans-unit.target: 当不响应的网页再次变成响应时发出。
